metadata.description: Multi-agent orchestration system for development workflows. 51 specialized agents covering product development, code quality, deployment, research, games, and more.

plugins.name: conductor_geepers
plugins.description: Master orchestrator for coordinating all geepers agents. Intelligent routing to specialists.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_product
plugins.description: Product development orchestrator - business planning, PRD creation, full-stack development pipeline.

plugins.name: geepers_business_plan
plugins.description: Business plan generator - market analysis, strategy documents for software projects.

plugins.name: geepers_prd
plugins.description: Product Requirements Document generator with clarifying questions and user stories.

plugins.name: geepers_fullstack_dev
plugins.description: Full-stack code generation from PRDs - frontend, backend, database, configuration.

plugins.name: geepers_intern_pool
plugins.description: Cost-effective multi-model code generation using tiered model strategy.

plugins.name: geepers_code_checker
plugins.description: Multi-model code validation - error checking, improvements, quality assurance.

plugins.name: geepers_docs
plugins.description: Documentation generator - README, setup guides, dependency explanations.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_checkpoint
plugins.description: Session maintenance orchestrator - scout, repo, status, snippets coordination.

plugins.name: geepers_scout
plugins.description: Project reconnaissance, quick fixes, improvement reports.

plugins.name: geepers_repo
plugins.description: Git hygiene, repository cleanup, commit organization.

plugins.name: geepers_status
plugins.description: Work accomplishment logging and project status dashboard maintenance.

plugins.name: geepers_snippets
plugins.description: Harvest reusable code patterns, maintain snippet library, deduplicate.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_deploy
plugins.description: Deployment orchestrator - validator, caddy, services coordination.

plugins.name: geepers_validator
plugins.description: Project validation - configurations, paths, permissions, integrations.

plugins.name: geepers_caddy
plugins.description: Caddy configuration management, port allocation, routing setup.

plugins.name: geepers_services
plugins.description: Service lifecycle management - start, stop, restart, logs.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_quality
plugins.description: Quality orchestrator - a11y, perf, api, deps coordination for audits.

plugins.name: geepers_a11y
plugins.description: Accessibility audits, WCAG compliance, assistive technology testing.

plugins.name: geepers_perf
plugins.description: Performance profiling, bottleneck identification, optimization.

plugins.name: geepers_deps
plugins.description: Dependency audits, security scanning, license compliance.

plugins.name: geepers_critic
plugins.description: UX and architecture critic - design decisions, friction, tech debt.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_research
plugins.description: Research orchestrator - swarm-style parallel data gathering.

plugins.name: geepers_swarm_research
plugins.description: Multi-tier research - Quick, Swarm, and Hive modes for varying depth.

plugins.name: geepers_data
plugins.description: Data quality auditing, validation, enrichment, freshness monitoring.

plugins.name: geepers_links
plugins.description: Link validation, broken link detection, URL enrichment.

plugins.name: geepers_diag
plugins.description: System diagnostics, error pattern detection, log analysis.

plugins.name: geepers_citations
plugins.description: Data validation and citation checking against sources.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_fullstack
plugins.description: Full-stack engineering orchestrator - backend to frontend coordination.

plugins.name: geepers_db
plugins.description: Database optimization, query analysis, index recommendations.

plugins.name: geepers_design
plugins.description: Visual design systems, typography, layout, color palettes.

plugins.name: geepers_react
plugins.description: React development - component architecture, hooks, state, performance.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_web
plugins.description: Web application orchestrator - Flask, React, design, accessibility.

plugins.name: geepers_flask
plugins.description: Flask application specialist - patterns, blueprints, extensions.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_python
plugins.description: Python project orchestrator - Flask, CLI, APIs, dependencies.

plugins.name: geepers_pycli
plugins.description: Python CLI tool specialist - argparse, click, typer patterns.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_games
plugins.description: Games orchestrator - gamedev, game, react, godot coordination.

plugins.name: geepers_gamedev
plugins.description: Video game development - mechanics, level design, player psychology.

plugins.name: geepers_game
plugins.description: Gamification design - reward systems, engagement loops, progress.

plugins.name: geepers_godot
plugins.description: Godot Engine development - GDScript, scenes, nodes, signals.

plugins.name: geepers_orchestrator_corpus
plugins.description: Corpus linguistics orchestrator - corpus, UX, database coordination.

plugins.name: geepers_corpus
plugins.description: Corpus linguistics projects, language datasets, NLP resources.

plugins.name: geepers_corpus_ux
plugins.description: Corpus linguistics UI/UX - KWIC displays, concordance viewers.

plugins.name: geepers_system_help
plugins.description: Reference guide for all geepers agents, generates documentation.

plugins.name: geepers_system_onboard
plugins.description: Project understanding for unfamiliar codebases, creates ONBOARD.md.

plugins.name: geepers_system_diag
plugins.description: Comprehensive system diagnostic - services, Caddy, ports, databases.

plugins.name: geepers_api
plugins.description: API design review, REST compliance, endpoint documentation.

plugins.name: geepers_scalpel
plugins.description: Surgical code modifications in complex files with high precision.

plugins.name: geepers_janitor
plugins.description: Aggressive cleanup - cruft, temp files, dead code removal.

plugins.name: geepers_canary
plugins.description: Early warning system, spot-checks fragile and critical systems.

plugins.name: geepers_dashboard
plugins.description: Dashboard synchronization, service persistence, admin panel updates.
